PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-02032015-02-19HC,  PHAC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActHuman Pathogens and Toxins Act
SubjectHuman Pathogens and Toxins Regulations
PrecisHUMAN PATHOGENS AND TOXINS REGULATIONS in order to (1) improve federal oversight of activities involving human pathogens and toxins in Canada; (2) establish national requirements for safe and secure handling of human pathogens and toxins; and (3) provide assurance that individuals with access to a prescribed list of security-sensitive human pathogens and toxins have an appropriate security clearance.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0044 Publication Date: 2015-03-11
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Human Pathogens and Toxins Regulations
precis: HUMAN PATHOGENS AND TOXINS REGULATIONS in order to (1) improve federal oversight of activities involving human pathogens and toxins in Canada; (2) establish national requirements for safe and secure handling of human pathogens and toxins; and (3) provide assurance that individuals with access to a prescribed list of security-sensitive human pathogens and toxins have an appropriate security clearance.
